title.narrative: OUTPUT 6.2: ADOLESCENT EMPOWERMENT & GENDER

description.narrative: Adolescents, especially the socially excluded in targeted locations, have greater opportunities to exercise their citizens' rights and demand accountability from decision makers.

mailing-address.narrative: Boulevard. du 30 Juin No. 87 Building de la Communauté Hellenique Commune de la Gombe B.P. 7248 Kinshasa

sector.narrative: Adolescents participating in or leading civic engagement initiatives (including in humanitarian settings)

Development of multi-sectoral legislation/policies/strategies/action plans supporting development and participation of adolescents
Relief co-ordination, protection and support services
Social protection and welfare services policy, planning and administration
System strengthening for adolescent participation and civic engagement (including in humanitarian settings)

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Adolescents, especially the socially excluded in targeted locations, have greater opportunities to exercise their citizens’ rights and demand accountability from decision makers.

[Number of adolescents, in particular girls and socially excluded adolescents guided to exercise their rights as citizens, actors of change, and as youth reporters] Nombre d'adolescents, en particulier de filles et d'adolescents socialement exclus, guids pour exercer leurs droits en tant que citoyens et acteurs du changement, en tant que jeunes reporters.

Number of adolescent girls and boys who participate in or lead civic engagement (including online) in UNICEF-supported programmes for COVID-19 preparedness, response and building back better (more resilient, peaceful, greener and sustainable) in the reporting year [COVID]

[Number of adolescents, in particular girls and socially excluded adolescents, in targeted locations trained on their rights (cumulative figure)] Nombre d'adolescents, en particulier de filles et d'adolescents socialement exclus, dans des lieux cibls et forms leurs droits (chiffre cumul).

[Number of adolescents, in particular girls and socially excluded adolescents that are active as members of representative children's committees as instituted by the national strategy to empower adolescents] Nombre d'adolescents, en particulier de filles et d'adolescents socialement exclus, membres actifs de comits reprsentatifs de l'enfance institus par la stratgie nationale d'autonomisation des adolescents.
[Existence of annual plans to implement the national strategy to empower adolescents] Existence de plans annuels pour la mise en uvre de la stratgie nationale d'autonomisation des adolescents.
